title: The copie of a sermon preached on good Friday last before the Kings Maiestie, by D. Andrevves Deane of Westminster. 6. April 1604
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
publisher: Printed by R. Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Running title reads: D. Andrewes sermon of the Passion of Christ.
This edition ends on leaf F2v.
Identified as STC 597b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in Folger Shakespeare Library.
